words.source: H1710 conj. + art. + n.fs דָּגָה 'fish'; KJV 'and the fish', ESV 'and the fish', NASB 'the fish'

H887 conj. + Qal perf. 3ms of בָּאַשׁ 'to stink'; KJV 'and the river shall stink', ESV 'and the Nile will stink', NASB 'and the Nile will become foul'
H2975 art. + n.ms יְאֹר 'Nile, river'; KJV 'the river', ESV 'the Nile', NASB 'the Nile'
H3811 conj. + Niphal perf. 3cp of לָאָה 'to be weary, unable'; KJV 'shall lothe', ESV 'will grow weary of', NASB 'will find it difficult'
